localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: The S&P 500 is crashing right now thanks to Tesla, which is responsible for 0.12% of its 0.44% decline.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text: S&P 500指数现在正在崩溃，这要归功于特斯拉，它要为其0.44%的跌幅负责0.12%。
S&P 500指數現在正在崩潰，這要歸功於特斯拉，它要爲其0.44%的跌幅負責0.12%。

previous.excerpt: Hey! We're an Australian start up that's just released BodyGuide. It's an app that helps you self solve aches, pains and tension. There's no payment details for the promo so you don't have to cancel. Fix your neck, back, shoulder, knee & hip pain - for free.
previous.title: BodyGuide - The app that helps you self-solve aches, pain and tension

localize.description: 嘿！我们是一家澳大利亚的创业公司，刚刚发布了BodyGuide。这是一款帮助你自我解决疼痛和紧张的应用。促销活动没有支付细节，所以你不必取消。修复你的颈部、背部、肩部、膝盖和臀部疼痛--免费。
localize.tagline: 这款应用程序可以帮助你自我解决疼痛，疼痛和紧张。

localize.description: 嘿！我們是一家澳大利亞的創業公司，剛剛發佈了BodyGuide。這是一款幫助你自我解決疼痛和緊張的應用。促銷活動沒有支付細節，所以你不必取消。修復你的頸部、背部、肩部、膝蓋和臀部疼痛--免費。
localize.tagline: 這款應用程序可以幫助你自我解決疼痛，疼痛和緊張。

next.excerpt: A single link for founders that allows investors to commit and send funds online. Once the Roll Up Vehicle (RUV) closes, AngelList sends one single wire to the company.
next.title: Roll Up Vehicles by AngelList - A single link for all your angel investors

localize.description: 为创始人提供一个单一的链接，让投资人可以在线承诺和发送资金。一旦卷帘车(RUV)关闭，AngelList就会向公司发送一条单线。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有天使投资人提供单一链接

localize.description: 爲創始人提供一個單一的鏈接，讓投資人可以在線承諾和發送資金。一旦捲簾車(RUV)關閉，AngelList就會向公司發送一條單線。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有天使投資人提供單一鏈接
